languages.text: {n}Внушительный мужчина в одеждах миссионера {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} обводит собравшихся тяжелым взглядом.{/n} "Слетелись, стервятнички? Молитву мы, конечно, вознесем. Но те из вас, кто думает, что Император — или вестник Его воли, то есть я — не видит ваши поганые душонки — сильно ошибаются!"

{n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"
languages.original_text: {n}Внушительный мужчина в одеждах миссионера {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} обводит собравшихся тяжелым взглядом.{/n} "Слетелись, стервятнички? Молитву мы, конечно, вознесем. Но те из вас, кто думает, что Император — или вестник Его воли, то есть я — не видит ваши поганые душонки — сильно ошибаются!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an Ecclesiarchy missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Sure, we will offer a prayer. But those of you who think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, are sorely mistaken!"

{n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an Ecclesiarchy missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Sure, we will offer a prayer. But those of you who think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, are sorely mistaken!"

{n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an Ecclesiarchy missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

{n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an Ecclesiarchy missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

{n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

languages.text: {n}一位面目狰狞的男子穿着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}传教士的装束，对聚集在一起的人们怒目而视。{/n}“都来了啊，你们这些秃鹫，那我们就来献上祈祷吧。不过，如果你们以为帝皇本人，或是他的使者，我，看不到你们的灵魂有多么卑劣，那你们就大错特错了！”
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位面目狰狞的男子穿着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}传教士的装束，对聚集在一起的人们怒目而视。{/n}“都来了啊，你们这些秃鹫，那我们就来献上祈祷吧。不过，如果你们以为帝皇本人，或是他的使者，我，看不到你们的灵魂有多么卑劣，那你们就大错特错了！”

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de aspecto duro con el atuendo de un misionero de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} lanza una mirada de desprecio a la multitud.{/n} «Y aquí estáis todos, buitres. Recemos, pues. Pero si creéis que el Emperador y el mensajero de Su voluntad, es decir, yo, no percibimos las intenciones de vuestras viles almas, ¡estáis muy equivocados!».
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de aspecto duro con el atuendo de un misionero de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} lanza una mirada de desprecio a la multitud.{/n} «Y aquí estáis todos, buitres. Recemos, pues. Pero si creéis que el Emperador y el mensajero de Su voluntad, es decir, yo, no percibimos las intenciones de vuestras viles almas, ¡estáis muy equivocados!».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}聖務団の服装をした威圧的な男が、集まった人々をにらみつけた。{/n}「ハゲタカたちよ、よくぞ集まってくれた。では、祈りを捧げよう。しかし、皇帝や、彼のご意志を伝える使者…つまり、私自身が、お前たちの下劣な魂を見抜いていないと思っているなら、それは大きな間違いだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}聖務団の服装をした威圧的な男が、集まった人々をにらみつけた。{/n}「ハゲタカたちよ、よくぞ集まってくれた。では、祈りを捧げよう。しかし、皇帝や、彼のご意志を伝える使者…つまり、私自身が、お前たちの下劣な魂を見抜いていないと思っているなら、それは大きな間違いだ！」

languages.text: {n}Ein imposanter Mann in der Gewandung eines Missionars der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} betrachtet die versammelte Menge.{/n} "Da seid Ihr nun also alle, Ihr Aasgeier. Gut, sprechen wir ein Gebet. Aber falls Ihr denkt, dass der Imperator – oder der Bote seines Willens, mit anderen Worten, ich – nicht tief in Eure üblen Seelen blickt, dann täuscht Ihr Euch gründlich!"
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein imposanter Mann in der Gewandung eines Missionars der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} betrachtet die versammelte Menge.{/n} "Da seid Ihr nun also alle, Ihr Aasgeier. Gut, sprechen wir ein Gebet. Aber falls Ihr denkt, dass der Imperator – oder der Bote seines Willens, mit anderen Worten, ich – nicht tief in Eure üblen Seelen blickt, dann täuscht Ihr Euch gründlich!"

languages.text: {n}Un homme à forte carrure vêtu d'une tenue de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} promène son regard sur la foule rassemblée devant lui.{/n} « Vous voilà donc, bande de vautours. Eh bien soit, prions. Mais si vous croyez que la noirceur de votre âme échappe à l'Empereur dont je représente ici même la volonté, vous faites erreur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme à forte carrure vêtu d'une tenue de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} promène son regard sur la foule rassemblée devant lui.{/n} « Vous voilà donc, bande de vautours. Eh bien soit, prions. Mais si vous croyez que la noirceur de votre âme échappe à l'Empereur dont je représente ici même la volonté, vous faites erreur ! »

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} misyoneri kıyafeti giyen heybetli bir adam, toplanan kalabalığa ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Hepiniz akbaba gibi toplanmışsınız. Madem öyle, duamızı edelim. Fakat İmparator'un ya da O'nun buyruklarının elçisinin, yani benim o alçak ruhlarınızı görmediğimizi sanıyorsanız çok yanılıyorsunuz!"
languages.original_text: {n}A formidable-looking man dressed in the attire of an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} missionary glares at the gathered crowd.{/n} "And here you all are, you vultures. Let's offer a prayer, then. But if you think that the Emperor — or the messenger of His will, in other words, myself — does not see into your vile souls, you are sorely mistaken!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} misyoneri gibi giyinmiş heybetli bir adam, toplanan kalabalığa göz atıyor.{/n} "Hepiniz akbaba gibi toplanmışsınız. Madem öyle, bir dua edelim. Fakat İmparator'un ya da onun buyruklarının elçisinin, yani benim, sizin o alçak ruhlarınızı görmediğimizi sanıyorsanız çok yanılıyorsunuz!"
